config.section.general.name: General
config.bitefaster.name: Bite Faster
config.bitefaster.description: It reduces the time it takes for fish to bite the bait.
config.hitautomatically.name: Hit Automatically
config.hitautomatically.description: You do not need to click the mouse to go to the minigame. If the feature to skip the minigame is enabled, you will caught the fish.
config.skipminigame.name: Skip Minigame
config.skipminigame.description: Skip the minigame and caught the fish.
config.fisheasycaught.name: Fish Easy Caught
config.fisheasycaught.description: In the minigame, the fish icon chases the bar.
config.treasurealwaysbefound.name: Treasure Always Be Found
config.treasurealwaysbefound.description: The treasure will appear every time. This works even if you want to skip the minigame.
config.treasureeasycaught.name: Treasure Easy Caught
config.treasureeasycaught.description: In the minigame, the treasure icon follows the bar.
config.alwayscaughtdoublefish.name: Always Caught Double Fish
config.alwayscaughtdoublefish.descriptio: If the bait is Wild Bait, it always catches two fish.
config.caughtdoublefishonanybait.name: Caught Double Fish On Any Bait
config.caughtdoublefishonanybait.descrip: You will get a chance to catch two fish regardless of the bait you are using. This can be used in conjunction with Always Caught Double Fish.
config.alwaysmaxcastpower.name: Always Max Cast Power
